review: I bought a fire tv stick a couple weeks ago.and i really love it:) it was really easy to plug into the back of my tv and it took a very short time to set up, after i signed into my account it seemed like minutes later i was able to watch movies and tv shows and play fun games like crossy road which is like old time frogger but more fun:) and it has an excellent picture: )It may not have the same Facebook app that roku has but it has an app that for i think just a dollar it gives notifications on the tv screen from Facebook and also shows texts messages from your phone on the screen too:)
author: Stephen leidy "electronics addict"

review: Good: Price, Size, Convenient, Video Quality, Amazon Prime, HDMI Commands (I.e. Turn on TV)Bad: Glitches, Lags, Display Artifacts, and did I mention a heaping ton of Ads?!Comments: Terrific for the price. I was delighted by the Amazon-Sling deal a few months back so I thought I'd give it a try. After 3 months, I've had a good, solid run with the Fire Stick, and come to the conclusion that I like the Apple TV better. In comparison to the AppleTV, there appears to be a bit of stuttering, lag, and overall glitching this with the Fire TV stick.Personal preferences aside, there does tend to be a lot more advertising that I'm comfortable with.
